question.text:
Which of the statement is/are correct?

A Catalytic converters have expensive metals like platinum, palladium and rhodium as a catalyst.

B Air act was amended in the year 1987 to include noise as a pollutant.

C A scrubber can remove gases like sulphur dioxide from polluted air.

D ESP can remove 99% particulate matter from the exhaust of vehicles.

options.text: <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: Catalytic converters are fitted with heavy metals like platinum, pallidium and rhodium which converts unburnt hydrocarbons into CO2 and H2O. Air prevention and control of air pollution act was passed in 1981 and amended in 1987 to include noise as a pollutant.
